Hi Jen,

That is excellent news! I am really glad we could get that sorted out for you and the team.

Please don't hesitate to reach out if anything else pops up - always happy to help!

Have a wonderful day!

Perfect thanks, invoices are generating correctly now.

Warm regards,

(Time: 45mins)

Hi Jen,

Thanks for clarifying!

I dug into the Sydney integration and found the issue. The automation (Zap) for Sydney had automatically switched itself off - this may have happened as a safety measure when the system detects billing/payment errors (related to the card update we just resolved with Janai).

All good now. I have reactivated the system and manually re-triggered the invoice for proposal-219753. It should be on its way to you now.

Everything should be running smoothly moving forward!

for the Sydney styling proposal site

Hi Janai,

That is great news - glad to hear the invoices are flowing again.

Regarding the missing "Sales Person": Since we were testing specifically for the connection (to ensure the invoice generated at all), we skipped several non-mandatory fields in the test data to simulate the process as quickly as possible. That is almost certainly why that field appeared blank.

Two quick requests to be sure:
  1. Send the PDF: Could you please forward that test invoice PDF so we can verify exactly which field was missed?
  2. Run a Real Test: If you have a moment, please try generating a proposal/invoice as you normally would (with all fields filled out).

If the Sales Person is still missing on a "real" attempt, let us know and we will dig deeper.

Hi all,

Thank you the test invoice came through, although it didn't have a sales person allocated. Could you please fix this?

Kind regards,

Hi Janai,

Spot on.

I can confirm the card currently linked to the Zapier account ends in 3731. I have attached a screenshot here for your reference.

I can't see the Zapier details from my end on the admin platform however, I am aware that since cancelling one of our credit cards those payments will decline and I don't think any payments were swapped over to a different card.

Could you please let me know if the payment method attached to Zapier ends in 3731? If so, this card was cancelled and that is why the payment wouldn't have gone through. Please let me know so I can update the payment method ASAP.

Kind regards,

(Time: 45mins)

Hi Janai,

Thanks for your patience. We are prioritizing this and working through the investigation to get it sorted as quickly as possible.

We wanted to share what we’ve found so far:
  • Testing Results: We just ran fresh tests for both EFT and Credit Card payments on the platform, and surprisingly, the invoices generated successfully on our end. This suggests the issue might be intermittent or specific to how the data is being passed along, rather than a total breakdown of the form itself.
  • The Likely Blocker: While checking the automation backend (Zapier) to understand why it might be failing for you, we noticed a few critical alerts:
    • The system is prompting us to upgrade because the current plan is set to "Free".
    • The invoicing workflow uses Xero, which Zapier classifies as a "Premium" feature that doesn't work on the Free plan.
    • Most importantly, we spotted a transaction marked as "Failed" in the billing history on January 5th.

It looks like that failed payment may have caused the account to automatically downgrade, which would block the invoices from being sent to Xero.

Next Steps: Could you please check your billing details or subscription status in Zapier?

Once the payment is cleared or the plan is upgraded, please let us know - we can run another test to confirm that the invoices are flowing through perfectly again.

Great thank you Adriane

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove

We are treating this as a high-priority ticket and will update you as soon as we have isolated the cause.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:
Good afternoon,

We urgently need this issue fixed. No invoices have been generating from the platform proposal after the vendor has accepted.

We raised this issue last week when we realised that no invoices were being generated when Credit Card was selected as the payment method however, now the invoices are also not generating when EFT is selected as a payment. I did try to fix this issue through the Admin portal on the Platform but it didn't fix the issue.

Could you please urgently action this as we could be missing vital payments for campaigns.

Kind regards,
